author: Aryan
message: Happy Birthday to the most amazing person I know! You bring so much joy and love into my life every single day. I'm so grateful to have you as my girlfriend and best friend. Here's to another year of adventures, laughter, and endless love together. I love you more than words can express! ðŸ’–
